resources.string:
You were born in a dysfunctional family,
no attention was paid to you in your life,
because of this, you decided to run away from home,
you face a difficult task to break into the people,
use your resources wisely,
Good luck!

You had an ordinary childhood,
no all your childhood expectations from this world,
 have been shattered by the harsh reality,
 you have to survive in this world,
 at the same time maintain all your indicators at the height,
 luck!

Your life was unhurried and measured,
but life is unfair,
a streak of bad luck makes you sink to the bottom,
pull yourself together, and secure a worthy old age,
Good luck!
You lost!\nYou died due to poor health,\nnext time watch your health.
You lost!\nYou died of hunger,\nnext time watch your satiety.
You lost!\nYou died of deep depression,\nnext time watch your mood.

You lost!
Your reputation is at zero, you became an outcast in society
and you were beaten with sticks
next time watch your reputation.

You lost!
Due to problems with your studies,you have become very stupid
for the rest of your life, you will have to beg
next time,watch your studies.
Congratulations!\nThrough hard work and self-development,\nyou can now work as a programmer.
Congratulations!\nThanks to your hard work,\nyou have opened a successful business.
Congratulations!\nNow, after purchasing a transport,\nyou can earn twice as much as a courier!

Hint:
To open a job as a programmer,
learn math and programming,
To open a business, read books and learn English.
To open a new job, you 
need to buy new housing.
Purchase vehicles to earn more money.
Be careful of bad guys habits,
it can kill.
And remember,
choice is an illusion.
